name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personal CRM for WhatsApp, Gmail, and LinkedIn Networking - Rumo

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync LinkedIn, WhatsApp, and Gmail contacts. Set reminders, and add notes or tags. Build a stronger personal or professional network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Build stronger relationships with Rumo Personal CRM. 

Keeping up with everyone in your life can be overwhelming with all the different apps and platforms. 

Rumo brings your favorite communication tools (LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Gmail, Zoho Mail, and more) into one interface, so you can effortlessly build and maintain lasting personal and professional relationships.

üîó Your Contacts in One Place
‚Ä¢ Import and merge contacts from LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Gmail and Zoho easily, with other platforms coming soon (email, social media, phone).
‚Ä¢ Organize your network in one unified space.

‚è∞ Never Miss a Beat
‚Ä¢ Get reminders for birthdays, anniversaries, and follow-ups.
‚Ä¢ Receive suggestions based on your past interactions.

üìù Improve your Networking
‚Ä¢ Take notes and tag contacts during or after meetings.
‚Ä¢ Easily access past notes and interaction history.

üîí Focus on Privacy
‚Ä¢ We don't access or store your messages, passwords or any other sensitive data.
‚Ä¢ Your data is encrypted and stored securely.
‚Ä¢ We don't share or sell your information.

üîÑ One-click Integrations
‚Ä¢ Download our extension in just one minute.
‚Ä¢ Sync Rumo with LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Gmail, and Zoho easily.

Perfect for professionals, freelancers, investors, and entrepreneurs who want to keep their relationships thriving.
